name: Rescue 3720 to 1
description:
Your mission:

A mining ship has been severely damaged.  You must navigate an asteroid field, salvage supplies, and rescue our stranded crew.

Timing is critical!

Our Intel suggests a catastrophic event will occur within the hour.  

Best of luck, pilots!

How to Play

  • Destroy Asteroids and Hostile Spacecraft.
  • Salvage Equipment
  • Rescue Stranded Crew before they die

Bonus points awarded for –

  • Clearing all Asteroids before the next wave (indicated by an alarm)
  • Lives remaining after surviving until the catastrophic event
  • Rescuing ALL stranded crew and surviving until the catastrophic event

Thanks for checking out Rescue 3720 to 1!

As you’ve probably already noticed, the game was heavily inspired by the arcade classic, Asteroids.  The twist, however, is a timed/rescue mechanic encouraging players to move quickly, rescuing crew and scoring as many points as possible within a short window of opportunity.

Once mastered, a complete run will never last more than approx. 7 minutes before the “end game” event, so the hope is to create a game that’s fast paced, quick-to-play, and encourages battles for the top spot on the scoreboard.

 

Currently working on:

  • Polishing SFX
  • Playtesting, balancing, bug detection/correction
  • Optimization; testing on older PCs

 

Planned for future update:

  • Ship selections 
  • Gamepad support  (I currently use the excellent JoyToKey when using gamepads on PC, but do plan to add “proper” gamepad support at a future time)
